messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Renaming this place to weewee station 69 hehe

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Suit senors on full please, a vaccine for appendictitus is now also available, stop by medbay for your injection.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: New experimental surgeries available, contact me to arrange one!

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: We now have a virus capable of healign people when in contact with water and multiple powers gained from genetics, not that people will use our services, they never do, also, don't forget teh appendictitus vaccine and the experimental surgery!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: There is an awful lot of people with suit sensors off, this angers me

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: We still got the expermental treatment going it's safe and helpful

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Just no nerve splicing for non command and security employees

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: CMO going SSD forever, i put the virologist in charge

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Experimentation Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Weewee Station 69's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
